name: 4th International Conference on User Science and Engineering 2016 (i-USEr 2016)
content: Topics for this conference include, but are not limited to: - HCI and Usability - User Experience - HCI and IT Infrastructure - HCI and e-services - HCI and Urban Science - Human-Centered Computing - HCI for the underserved - Human Interface and Management of Information - HCI and Analytics - HCI and Domestic Technologies
